description: View and manage everything in the system.

name: delegated:all
description: View and manage your account.
adminDescription: View and manage a user's account on behalf of them using delegated access.

name: delegated:system:settings:read
description: View system settings.
adminDescription: View system settings on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:roles:all
description: View and manage your roles.
adminDescription: View and manage user roles on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:roles:read
description: View your roles.
adminDescription: View user roles on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:profile:all
description: View and manage your profile information.
adminDescription: View and manage user profile information on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:profile:read
description: View your profile information.
adminDescription: View user profile information on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:profile:login-history:read
description: View your login history information.
adminDescription: View login history information on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:profile:write
description: Edit your profile information.
adminDescription: Manage user profile information on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:profile:2fa:all
description: View and manage Two-Factor Authentication for your account.
adminDescription: View and manage two-factor authentication of user accounts on behalf of them.

name: delegated:profile:2fa:write
description: Manage Two-Factor Authentication for your account.
adminDescription: Manage two-factor authentication of user accounts on behalf of a them.

name: delegated:profile:search
description: Search for people on your behalf.
adminDescription: Search for people on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:all
description: View and manage information about people you follow and people you've blocked.
adminDescription: View and manage social features like following and blocking on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:follow:all
description: View and manage your followers and people you follow.
adminDescription: View and manage followings and followers of a user on behalf of them.

name: delegated:social:follow:read
description: View people you follow and your followers.
adminDescription: View followings and followers of a user on behalf of them.

name: delegated:social:follow:write
description: Manage people you follow and your followers.
adminDescription: Manage followings and followers of a user on behalf of them.

name: delegated:social:follow:accept
description: Accept follow requests on your behalf.
adminDescription: Accept follow requests on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:follow:remove
description: Remove your followers on your behalf.
adminDescription: Remove followers on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:follow:request
description: Follow people on your behalf.
adminDescription: Follow people on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:follow:unfollow
description: Unfollow people on your behalf.
adminDescription: Accept follow requests on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:block:all
description: Block, unblock and view people you've blocked on your behalf.
adminDescription: Block, unblock and view people a user has blocked on behalf of them.

name: delegated:social:block:read
description: View people you've blocked.
adminDescription: View people a user has blocked on behalf of them.

name: delegated:social:block:write
description: Block people on your behalf.
adminDescription: Block people on behalf of a user.

name: delegated:social:invite-code:read
description: View your invite codes.
adminDescription: View invite codes on behalf of a user.
